import { Card, Form, Button, Container, Row, Col, Badge, Alert, Tab, ListGroup, Accordion, Modal } from 'react-bootstrap' import React, { useRef,useState, useEffect } from 'react'; //ref to Todo.js -> ListsComponent const ProjectsList = () => { return ( {Array.from({ length: 4 }).map((_, idx) => ( Project Title Project Description ))} ); } const Home = ({ userName }) => { const [m_userName, setUserName] = useState(userName) const [show, setShow] = useState(false); const handleClose = () => setShow(false); const handleShow = () => setShow(true); const addProject = () => { handleShow(); } const submitProject = ()=> { } //read projcets of user return (
Hello, {m_userName}
My Projects
Task Details Projcet Name Description
)} export default Home
